text.div:
Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSEncounter

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSEncounter 0..*BaseEncounter model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
identifier 0..*IdentifierC.30.1 - Identifier
priority 0..1CodeableConceptC.30.3 - Priority
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7:v3-xEncounterAdmissionUrgency

encounterType 1..1CodeableConceptC.30.2 - Encounter type
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7v3:ActEncounterCode

encounterNote 0..1stringC.30.4 - Encounter note
patient 0..1Reference(Patient model)C.30.5 - Patient
episodeOfCare 0..*Reference(Episode of care model)C.30.6 - Episode of care
basedOn 0..*Reference(Care plan model | Service request model)C.30.7 - Based on
partOf 0..1Reference(Encounter model)C.30.8 - Part of
serviceProvider 0..1Reference(Organization model)C.30.9 - Service provider
appointment 0..*Reference(Appointment model)C.30.10 - Appointment
actualPeriod 0..1PeriodC.30.11 - Actual period
plannedStartDate 0..1dateTimeC.30.12 - Planned start date
plannedEndDate 0..1dateTimeC.30.13 - Planned end date
admission 0..1BaseC.30.14 - Admission
admitter 0..1Reference(Health professional model)C.30.14.1 - Admitter
admitSource 0..1CodeableConceptC.30.14.2 - Admit Source
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7:admit-source

referringProfessional 0..1Reference(Health professional model)C.30.14.3 - Referring professional
admissionReason 0..*Reference(Condition model | Procedure model | Observation model)C.30.14.4 - Admission reason
admissionReasonComment 0..1stringC.30.14.5 - Admission reason comment
admissionLegalStatus 0..1CodeableConceptC.30.14.6 - Admission legal status
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): SNOMED CT

discharge 0..1BaseC.30.15 - Discharge
destinationType 0..1CodeableConceptC.30.15.1 - Destination type
Binding Description (No ValueSet): (preferred): hl7.discharge-disposition

destinationLocation 0..1Reference(Organization model | Location model)C.30.15.2 - Destination location
location 0..*BaseC.30.16 - Location
period 0..1PeriodC.30.16.1 - Period
organizationPart 1..1EHDSLocationC.30.16.2 - Organization part

Documentation for this format

name: EHDSEncounter
title: Encounter model
description: C.30 - EHDS refined base model for Encounter

element.definition: C.30 - EHDS refined base model for Encounter
Encounter identifier (Business identifiers assigned to this encounter).
Indicates the urgency of the encounter.
The type of the encounter whether inpatient or short stay encounter.
A narrative description of the encounter course.
The patient related to this encounter.
Episode(s) of care that this encounter should be recorded against
The request that initiated this encounter
Another Encounter this encounter is part of
The organization (facility) responsible for this encounter
The appointment that scheduled this encounter
The actual start and end time of the encounter
The planned start date/time (or admission date) of the encounter
The planned end date/time (or discharge date) of the encounter
Details about the admission to a healthcare service
Admitting Healthcare Professional
From where the patient was admitted (e.g. physician referral, transfer).
Referring Healthcare Professional
Reason or reasons for admission, e.g. Problem, procedure or finding.
Explanation of the reason for the encounter.

Legal status/situation at admission. The legal status indicates the basis on which the patient is staying in a healthcare organisation. This can be either voluntary or involuntary, however the legal status is always determined by a court. A patient can also receive healthcare based on a forensic status. (voluntary, involuntary, admission by legal authority).
Discharge details
Type of location to which the patient will go after the encounter. E.g. home, hospital, nursing home, left against medical advice etc.
The location/organisation to which the patient will go after the encounter. Name, address and telecommunication contact.
List of locations where the patient has been.
Time period during which the patient was present at the location
Organization or organization part (department) where the patient was present.
